can i run wine on powerpc architecture?: i'm using ubuntu on an old clamshell 300mhz iBook, can i run wine on it?
anyone?  nein?  i assume wine didn't come with the powerpc distro for a reason
you cannot use wine on a powerpc because the binaries that wine would run are compiled for i386, however applications can be ported to linux-ppc with winelib (this requires the source though)
